message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you consider that?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and sell the product to you for $155.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. I really want to make this deal happen, so I'm willing to meet you at your last offer, but I need it to be exactly $150.
